education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering, Minor in Data Science

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

experience.title: Software Engineer (Distributed Systems)
details: Designed and implemented globally available distributed systems using AWS technologies, improving system availability by 99.9%
Developed deployment tools and test execution frameworks that reduced CI/CD pipeline time by 25%
Implemented distributed cloud-based services and APIs that supported 30% increase in transaction volume
Partnered with frontend and security engineering teams to implement secure communication protocols including TCP/IP
Mentored junior engineers in software development best practices and engineering excellence principles
Implemented fault-tolerant mechanisms in Linux-based systems, increasing uptime by 15%

experience.title: Software Engineer (Cloud Services)
details: Developed containerized microservices using Docker and Kubernetes, improving deployment efficiency by 30%
Designed and implemented testing frameworks for continuous integration and monitoring of distributed systems
Optimized network protocols and QoS algorithms for financial transactions, reducing latency by 20%
Implemented object-oriented design patterns to create scalable cloud services handling 1M+ daily transactions
Collaborated with networking teams to implement secure communication protocols including IPv4/IPv6

experience.title: Software Engineer (Embedded Systems)
details: Developed Linux-based embedded software for microcontroller applications using C++
Implemented RTOS concepts in system design, improving real-time processing capabilities by 15%
Participated in full SDLC including code reviews, testing, and operations for embedded systems
Assisted in systems integration and testing methodologies for wireless network applications
Gained experience in network security protocols and software defined networks

projects.name: Distributed Cloud Communication System
details: Designed and implemented a globally distributed communication system using AWS technologies, achieving 99.9% availability
Developed tools for automated test execution across multiple environments, reducing testing time by 30%
Implemented secure communication protocols including IPv6 and TCP/IP for satellite network simulations
Containerized services using Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes to support 1M+ concurrent connections

projects.name: Embedded Network Protocol Simulator
details: Developed a Linux-based embedded system simulator for testing network protocols including LTE and 802.11ac
Implemented QoS algorithms that improved packet prioritization efficiency by 25%
Designed test frameworks for continuous integration of embedded software components
Optimized system performance for ARM processor architectures through low-level code optimizations
